content: @Bhavik Mehta do you have thoughts on https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib/pull/7274#issuecomment-1059574783 ?

Just added a review - I'll repeat what I said there about the potential overlap with unit-fractions: I have a sorry-free proof that the sum behaves as log log x + b + O(1/log x) for some constant b in the blueprint here which is a stronger result, but it uses a bunch of (currently messy) prerequisites, and I certainly don't want to hold up this PR on my messy code.
